nodes.text: Jubilee was a officer in the Rebel Alliance who served aboard a blockade runner under the command of Captain Chedaki. In 3 ABY, Jubilee was aboard the vessel when it traveled to the remote Shiva system to investigate a suspicious amount of Imperial interest in the obscure region. Their ship carried the important Rebel leader Leia Organa—when Organa and Chedaki attempted to scan the inhabited Shiva IV, their shuttle was badly damaged by anti-matter bombs. Jubilee was ordered to help Organa escape before jettisoning the shuttle, but quickly realized that the craft could not be remotely removed safely. Instead, Jubilee could only watch frantically as Organa made the choice to save the ship by crashing the craft on the planet below.

Jubilee first appeared in Star Wars 53: The Last Gift from Alderaan, written by Chris Claremont and released in 1981. Although Jubilee has a speaking role in the story, the character is not physically pictured, instead communicating with Leia Organa over a comlink.
